price: Àwọn tó ń ṣe iṣẹ́ (burúkú) nípa àwọn āyah Wa, tí wọ́n ń dá àwọn ènìyàn ní agara (láti tẹ̀lé àwọn āyah Wa, tí wọ́n sì lérò pé àwọn máa mórí bọ́ lọ́dọ̀ Allāhu); àwọn wọ̀nyẹn ni (àwọn mọlāika) máa kó wá sínú Iná.”
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡعَوۡنَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مُعَٰجِزِينَ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ مُحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yasʿawna fī āyātinā muʿājizīna ulāika fī al-ʿadhābi muḥ'ḍarūna
